name: A Congkak Playscape
description:
A-Congkak-Playscape is a multi-player playscape building game contained within a reinterpretation of the traditional game, “Congkak”.

It comprises 3d-printed game pieces sourced from the past, present and future of Malaysia’s urban morphology. The pieces represent an abstraction of elements from Malaysia’s ever changing built environment. Played out on a multitiered game platform, it seeks to engage audiences with the logics of creating new environments for play, whether young or old. 

The object was fabricated and exhibited at the National Design Centre, Singapore in 2020.
